## Project Overview
UdyomX ORG organization website with blog, projects, and services using Next.js 14 App Router, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, Shadcn/UI, and Supabase.

**Organization:** UdyomX ORG  
**Author:** Mokammel Morshed  
**Admin Email:** mdmokammelmorshed@gmail.com

## Key Features
- Mobile-first responsive design with Neu-Brutalism styling
- Google OAuth authentication for all users
- User dashboard for viewing/ordering services
- Admin panel (only for admin email) for content management
- Multiple layout themes for blog posts
- Order management system
- MockAPI for development, Supabase for production
- SEO/GEO/AEO optimized
- Performance-focused (SSG, ISR, SWR)

## Tech Stack
- Next.js 14 (App Router)
- TypeScript
- Tailwind CSS
- Shadcn/UI
- Framer Motion
- Supabase (Auth & Database)
- MockAPI (Development phase)
